sessions.description: V2 Gold Standard Report Creation and Validation

interactions.description: Create V2 Gold Standard Report from scratch using v2 gold standard results

details.structure: 5 parts: Executive Summary, Per-Prompt Analysis, Cross-Prompt Analysis, Conclusions, Metadata

details.issue: Report used expanded prompt version instead of actual v2 short prompt

interactions.description: Corrected Organizer-1 prompt to match gold standard

details.wrong_prompt: Keep my Calendar up to date by committing to only meetings that are part of my priorities. My priorities are customer meetings and product strategy. Show me as 'Busy' for high priority meetings and keep all declined meetings on my calendar.
details.correct_prompt: Keep my Calendar up to date by committing to only meetings that are part of my priorities.

interactions.description: Validated all 7 task decompositions against gold standard JSON
Updated execution compositions and example flows for shorter prompt

details.content: All 9 prompts with F1 scores, capabilities, task counts

interactions.description: Committed and pushed all changes to GitHub

details.user_query: did do all the tasks that .cursorrules say you need to do?
details.result: Identified missing daily logging and Lessons section update

interactions.description: Updated .cursorrules Lessons section with V2 report learnings

details.section: V2 Gold Standard Report Creation Lessons

accomplishments.description: Corrected prompt accuracy by comparing to original source files

details.issue_found: Expanded prompt vs actual v2 prompt

accomplishments.description: Documented all data sources and creation process
Identified framework gaps (CAN-05, CAN-24) with actionable next steps

details.CAN-05_issue: Detection weakness in 3 prompts (Schedule-2, Collaborate-1, Collaborate-2)
details.CAN-24_clarification: Unused due to deterministic scheduling, needed for negotiation scenarios

decisions.description: Use dual source validation (JSON + TXT) for prompt accuracy
decisions.rationale: Gold standard JSON is authoritative for task lists, original prompt files are authoritative for prompt text

decisions.description: Add Supporting Documents section to report
decisions.rationale: Transparency and reproducibility are critical for production-grade documentation
decisions.impact: Future users can trace data lineage and validate report accuracy

decisions.rationale: .cursorrules emphasizes detailed commit messages for project continuity
decisions.impact: Future developers understand context and impact of changes

decisions.description: Create manual post-session log instead of skipping daily logging
decisions.rationale: Daily logging requirement in .cursorrules, real-time logging not possible without session initialization
decisions.impact: Maintains project continuity and knowledge sharing despite technical limitation

challenges.resolution: Cross-validated against two authoritative sources, corrected all dependent sections
challenges.lesson_learned: Always verify against original source files, not derivative documents

challenges.description: Daily interaction logging requires session initialization at start
challenges.resolution: Created manual post-session log capturing all interactions and accomplishments
challenges.lesson_learned: Document workarounds when technical requirements cannot be met retroactively

sessions.description: Schedule-2 CAN-05 removal and comprehensive gold standard corrections

interactions.description: Decision: CAN-05 (Attendee Resolution) NOT needed for existing calendar meetings - attendee info available via CAN-07 metadata extraction

details.decision: CAN-05 (Attendee Resolution) NOT needed for existing calendar meetings - attendee info available via CAN-07 metadata extraction
details.reasoning: User insight: Schedule-2 works with already-booked meetings. Attendee information is in calendar metadata. CAN-05 only needed when resolving ambiguous references like '{name}' or 'senior leadership' to specific identities.

interactions.description: Decision: Always update source JSON files first, then propagate to derived documentation

details.decision: Always update source JSON files first, then propagate to derived documentation
details.reasoning: v2_gold_standard_v2_20251107.json is the authoritative source. All other files (reports, summaries, metrics) derive from it. Updating source first ensures consistency and prevents documentation drift.

accomplishments.description: Identified and documented CAN-05 distinction - not needed for existing meetings vs needed for ambiguous references
Corrected Schedule-2 gold standard: removed CAN-05, updated from 9 to 8 tasks, F1 improved from 77.78% to 88.89%

Updated 7 documentation files with Schedule-2 corrections: V2_GOLD_STANDARD_REPORT, V2_HERO_PROMPTS_LIST, METRIC_UPDATE_SUMMARY, v2_recalculated_metrics, GPT5_STABILITY_TEST, SCHEDULE_2_DEEP_DIVE, GPT5_V2_OPTIMIZATION
Updated source gold standard JSON (v2_gold_standard_v2_20251107.json) - the authoritative source of truth for all derived documentation
Improved overall framework metrics: Mean F1 91.98% to 93.21%, F1 Std Dev 16.38% to 14.97%, Mean Precision 90.86% to 92.10%, Mean Recall 93.83% to 94.94%
Updated .cursorrules with November 8 session accomplishments and added comprehensive CAN-05 distinction lesson

major_accomplishments: Corrected Organizer-1 prompt to match gold standard (100% accuracy)
Updated all dependent sections (task decompositions, execution flows, examples)
Added Supporting Documents section (7 sources + 6-step process)
Updated .cursorrules Lessons section with 12 key learnings
Identified framework gaps with actionable remediation steps

major_accomplishments.description: Identified and documented CAN-05 distinction - not needed for existing meetings vs needed for ambiguous references
Corrected Schedule-2 gold standard: removed CAN-05, updated from 9 to 8 tasks, F1 improved from 77.78% to 88.89%

Updated 7 documentation files with Schedule-2 corrections: V2_GOLD_STANDARD_REPORT, V2_HERO_PROMPTS_LIST, METRIC_UPDATE_SUMMARY, v2_recalculated_metrics, GPT5_STABILITY_TEST, SCHEDULE_2_DEEP_DIVE, GPT5_V2_OPTIMIZATION
Updated source gold standard JSON (v2_gold_standard_v2_20251107.json) - the authoritative source of truth for all derived documentation
Improved overall framework metrics: Mean F1 91.98% to 93.21%, F1 Std Dev 16.38% to 14.97%, Mean Precision 90.86% to 92.10%, Mean Recall 93.83% to 94.94%
Updated .cursorrules with November 8 session accomplishments and added comprehensive CAN-05 distinction lesson

lessons_learned: Always verify prompts against original source files (9_hero_prompts_v2.txt), not derivative documents
Gold standard JSON is authoritative for task decompositions
Dual source validation prevents documentation discrepancies
Dependent sections cascade when prompts change - must update task descriptions, examples, execution flows
Document data provenance (Supporting Documents section) ensures reproducibility
Follow writing guide formatting precisely (Input: vs User Input:, add Context: lines)
.cursorrules has multiple requirements beyond git operations (daily logging, Lessons updates, Scratchpad)
Production-ready documentation serves multiple purposes (evaluation, training, implementation)
Comprehensive commit messages critical for project continuity (60+ lines documenting context)
CAN-24 distinction: deterministic scheduling (used) vs negotiation (not needed in v2 prompts)
Framework gaps can be identified through systematic validation (CAN-05 detection weakness)
Manual post-session logging better than skipping requirement when real-time logging not possible
decisions_made: Use dual source validation (JSON + TXT) for all prompt verification
Add Supporting Documents section to all future gold standard reports
Write comprehensive commit messages (40+ lines) for major documentation work
Create manual post-session logs when real-time logging not initialized
Document framework gaps immediately with actionable remediation steps

decisions_made.decision: CAN-05 (Attendee Resolution) NOT needed for existing calendar meetings - attendee info available via CAN-07 metadata extraction
decisions_made.reasoning: User insight: Schedule-2 works with already-booked meetings. Attendee information is in calendar metadata. CAN-05 only needed when resolving ambiguous references like '{name}' or 'senior leadership' to specific identities.

decisions_made.decision: Always update source JSON files first, then propagate to derived documentation
decisions_made.reasoning: v2_gold_standard_v2_20251107.json is the authoritative source. All other files (reports, summaries, metrics) derive from it. Updating source first ensures consistency and prevents documentation drift.

next_day_priorities: Verify remaining 8 prompts against 9_hero_prompts_v2.txt for accuracy
Validate CAN-24 design with test prompts requiring negotiation workflows
Strengthen CAN-05 detection in Schedule-2, Collaborate-1, Collaborate-2 prompts
Multi-model validation: Benchmark Claude 3.5 Sonnet and GPT-4 Turbo against gold standard
Initialize daily_interaction_logger at session start for future sessions

notes: Two sessions logged today: (1) v2gold001 - manual post-session summary for Organizer-1 gold standard work, and (2) 923cdd61 - real-time logging of Schedule-2 CAN-05 removal and comprehensive documentation corrections. Session 923cdd61 demonstrates proper workflow with start/log/end cycle.
